mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.name,password,email,wechat,admin,telephone,position,sex,birthday,t2.id cId,t2.name cName from t_teacher t1,t_course t2 where t1.id=#{id} and t1.teaching=t2.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_teacher (id, name, password, email, position, telephone, wechat, sex, birthday,admin,teaching) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{position}, #{telephone}, #{wechat}, #{sex},#{birthday}, #{admin},#{teaching})
